summary: The diff implements a comprehensive pricing page with visual subscription tier cards, static PIX QR code display, and payment instructions in Portuguese. All three requirements (REQ-1, REQ-2, REQ-3) are addressed with evidence of implementation including routing, UI components, and Portuguese translations.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate a static PIX QR code image using the email key 'proj.defdriver+pagbank@gmail.com'
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows code referencing a QR code image (pix-qr-code.dim_400x400.png) but the actual static image file generation or addition is not shown in the diff summary. The code displays the QR code but there's no evidence the static image file was created or added to the project.
